entity.name: COVID-19: Global updates
entity.description: The latest news and analysis on the coronavirus pandemic from around the world.

text:
A special disinfectant tunnel has been installed in Russian President Vladimir Putin's house to protect him from coronavirus, state media reported.

The tunnel is designed to disinfect everyone passing through it with a "fine water mist." https://t.co/oOElIgsZwk
